```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```


```{r schedule}
library(kableExtra)
schedule <- data.frame(Week = seq(1:16),
                       M = c("[Intro to WILD3810](lecture1.html)", NA, "MLK Holiday - no class", NA, NA, NA, "President's Day - no class", NA, NA, "Spring break - no class", NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA),
                       W = c("[Abundance](lecture1.html)", NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, "Spring break - no class", NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA),
                       Lab = c("Introduction to R", NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, "Spring break - no class", NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA))

schedule %>%
  kable("html", col.names = c("Week", "M", "W", "Lab"), align = 'c') %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"), full_width = TRUE) %>%
  add_header_above(c("", "Lecture" = 2, ""))

```
